headline: The Andersons, Inc. Names Steven Oakland to Board of Directors
summary: The Andersons, Inc. (Nasdaq: ANDE) has named Steven Oakland to the company's board of directors, effective August 21, 2025.

raw.headline: The Andersons, Inc. Names Steven Oakland to Board of Directors
raw.summary: The Andersons, Inc. (Nasdaq: ANDE) has named Steven Oakland to the company's board of directors, effective August 21, 2025.

headline: Does Hostess Impairment and Legal Scrutiny Change the Bull Case for J.M. Smucker (SJM)?
summary: In June 2025, The J.M. Smucker Company disclosed significant impairment charges related to its Sweet Baked Snacks segment, following its acquisition of Hostess Brands, prompting multiple securities law firms to launch federal investigations. This development has drawn attention to whether the company provided misleading statements about the integration benefits and timing of impairment recognition associated with the Hostess deal. We’ll explore how these recently announced impairment charges...
